instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Add the Google Fonts imports to the <head> of index.html immediately.
2. GLOBAL CSS: Apply 'bg-black text-white font-vt323' to the body in index.css. Add the CRT overlay CSS class.
3. COMPONENTS: Do NOT use rounded corners (rounded-lg, rounded-md). Override Shadcn defaults to 'rounded-none'.
4. SHADOWS: Use hard shadows (box-shadow: 4px 4px 0px 0px #fff) instead of soft blurs.
5. ROADMAPS: Use React Flow with custom nodes that look like pixel art boxes.
6. EDITOR: Initialize Monaco Editor with a dark theme (vs-dark) and a pixel-like font if possible.
7. AUTH: Ensure both Google OAuth and Email/Password forms follow the pixel aesthetic.
8. IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. If an image fails, fallback to a placeholder but maintain the layout.
9. ANIMATIONS: Use 'step-end' easing for animations to mimic 8-bit movement.
10. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients unless they are harsh/dithering patterns.
Ensure high contrast (WCAG AA/AAA) - Black/White is safe.
Use 'sonner' for toasts with custom styling (black bg, white border).
Create a 'design_system' folder if needed to store reusable pixel components.
